attributes.action: ensure NHS Trusts automatically prescribe calcium supplementation and discharge particularly surgical trauma patients with adequate nutrition to enable their bones to heal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rising costs of osteoporosis treatments, longer hospital stays and readmissions are some of the sequelae of orthopaedic services planning. The above may be one option that the DoH may consider, after obviously conducting a cost - benefit analysis by NICE into the efficacy.
